revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Being |image = [[File:Cave of Being.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Being. |tokens = 286,500 |location = Between Unova Route 19 & 20 }} '''Cave of Being''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 4,603,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra || rowspan=7 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Woobat.png|40px]] Woobat |- | [[File:Gurdurr.png|40px]] Gurdurr |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Uxie.png|40px]] Uxie || rowspan=3|<center> 35,000,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Mesprit.png|40px]] Mesprit |- | [[File:Azelf.png|40px]] Azelf |}
